personalInfo.clubAffl: Beau Chene CC, Money Hill Golf & CC (Mandeville, Louisiana)

tourBios.intlVics: (3) 2012 Bridgestone Winter Series Event [NGA], 2013 Three Ridges Classic [NGA], 2014 Cutter Creek Classic [NGA]
tourBios.curYrHigh: Flirted with the possibility of the first 59 ever on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica during a second round of 10 birdies and a hole-in-one at the season opening 69th Avianca Colombia Open in February. His 12-under 60 was a new course record at Club Campestre Medellin Llano Grande and the lowest score in relation to par ever recorded on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. His ace at the par-3 17th, his eighth hole of the second round, was the result of a pitching wedge from 164 yards. Claimed the 36-hole lead at 17-under 127 to claim the lowest score for the first 36 holes and to match the lowest total for any 36 holes on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica. Shot 72-78 the next two days to finish solo eighth.
tourBios.carHigh:
2015: Joined PGA TOUR Latinoamérica with a T13 finish at the Lima, Peru Q-School in January… Had a runner-up finish, three top-10s, five top-20s and 12 cuts made in 15 starts on PGA TOUR Latinoamérica… Was ranked 60th on the Order of Merit with two tournaments to play, but had back-to-back top-5s, T5 at the Lexus Peru Open and T2 at the PGA TOUR Latinoamérica Tour Championship, to close out the year ranked 23rd... His other top-10 was T7 at the Volvo Colombian Classic in September… Carded a season low 9-under 63 to share the opening round lead at the 57th Abierto Mexicano, an event he finished T12 in May.

2014: Missed the cut at the Zurich Classic of New Orleans on the PGA TOUR… Missed the cut at the Chitimacha Louisiana Open on the Web.com Tour… Won the NGA Tour's Cutter Creek Classic in June. Finished at 14-under 274 for a four-stroke win in Snow Hill, North Carolina.

2013: Made his PGA TOUR debut with two cuts made in as many starts, finishing T21 at the Zurich Classic of New Orleans in April and T35 at the Sanderson Farms Championship in July… Missed the cut at the Air Capital Classic on his first career start on the Web.com Tour in June… Won the NGA Tour's Three Ridges Classic in May. Finished at 12-under 272 for a five strokes at Three Ridges GC in Knoxville, TN.

2012: Won an NGA Tour Bridgestone Winter Series Event at Diamondback Golf Club in Orlando in January for first pro win on his first start as a pro… Earned co-Rookie of the Year honors on the NGA Tour.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: Won the 2010 LGA Louisiana Amateur Championship… Played college golf at the University of New Orleans (UNO) for three seasons and then transferred to LSU for his senior season in 2010-11… Captured three tournament titles and nine top-10 finishes in three seasons at UNO while leading the Privateers with scoring averages of 72.66 as a sophomore in 2008-09 and 72.73 as a junior in 2009-10… Had two top-5s and four top-10s in 10 starts at LSU, with a scoring average of 73.30.
tourBios.personal: Has two older sisters, Allison and Caroline ... Father, Ken Sr., played college golf at Mississippi State ... Graduated from LSU with a degree in marketing in 2011… Rob Noel is his golf instructor… Favorite teams are LSU, the New Orleans Saints, the Chicaco Blackhawks and Manchester United… Twitter name is @Ken_Looper
tourBios.exmtStatus: Exempt - 2015 Tournament Winner / Order of Merit Top-60

dyn.dynResults: His best finish on the PGA TOUR Latinoameri in 2016 is 8th at the 69 Avianca Colombia Open presentado por BBVA.
dyn.dynStats: He ranks T12th in Scoring Average (Actual) on the Latinoamérica.
